trans-unit.source: Provides methods and attached properties that support data validation.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder metoder og tilknyttede egenskaper som støtter datavalideringen.

trans-unit.source: For a detailed discussion of the validation process, see "Data Validation" in [Data Binding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis en detaljert beskrivelse av valideringen, kan du se "Datavalidering" i [Data Binding oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Adds an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error> attached event to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error>hendelsen er koblet til det angitte objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> object to add `handler` to.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> object to add `handler` to.

trans-unit.source: The handler to add.
trans-unit.target: Et behandlingsprogram for å legge til.

trans-unit.source: Removes all <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref> objects from the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner alle <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"> </xref> objekter fra den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The `bindingExpression` object may have been invalid from a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.MarkInvalid%2A> call or a previously failed validation.
trans-unit.target: Den `bindingExpression` objekt kan ha blitt ugyldig fra en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.MarkInvalid%2A>kall eller en tidligere mislykket validering.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.MarkInvalid%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object is valid after this call.
trans-unit.target: Objektet er ugyldig etter dette kallet.

trans-unit.source: The object to turn valid.
trans-unit.target: Objektet til å aktivere gyldig.

trans-unit.target: If bindingExpression is .

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Marks the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref> object as invalid with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Merker det angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"> </xref> som ugyldig med angitt <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> object stays invalid until <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ClearInvalid%2A> is called or another transfer to the binding source validates successfully.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>objektet forblir ugyldig før <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ClearInvalid%2A>kalles eller en annen overføring til datakilden for binding validerer ble.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ClearInvalid%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref> object to mark as invalid.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"> </xref> objekt merkes som ugyldig.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref> object to use.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"> </xref> objekt som skal brukes.

trans-unit.target: If validationError is .

trans-unit.target: Et behandlingsprogram til å fjerne.
